A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A poor exercise in deconstructing the heroic character and paragons of virtue that came before.  A shallow and transparent attempt to use the older cast as tools to use to pass off a money printing machine to a corporation\, then be disposed of.  Kathleen Kennedy and her cabal of anti-intellectual corporate suits in her writer's room have done it again\, created a soulless advertisement for toys\, lead by a non-character.
